outline:
1. fatness, fat piece, fertile place, richly prepared food
    1. fat, fatness, fat pieces
    2. oil, olive oil
  2. fatness
    1. stout, vigorous
    2. fertile spots or places
strongs_def: fat, i.e. (literally and abstractly) fatness; but usually (figuratively and concretely) a rich dish, a fertile field, a robust man
